Orange County Natural History Museum.knownFor: “ Enjoyable Afternoon ” Reviewed December 31, 2013 Very well organized and detailed museum, HVAC worked nicely, acoustics in recital area was fine, felt sorry for lady introducer who never spoke loud enough to be understood.
